verses.text: Asa’s \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w place|strong="H8478"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w strengthened|strong="H2388"\w* \w himself|strong="H2388"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3605"\w* stationed \w troops|strong="H2428"\w* \w in|strong="H5892"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w fortified|strong="H1219"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w garrisons|strong="H5333"\w* \w in|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w in|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* Ephraim \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* father Asa \w had|strong="H3063"\w* \w captured|strong="H3920"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w earlier|strong="H7223"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* \f + \fr 17:3 \ft Or in his early years he walked in the ways\f* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* father \w David|strong="H1732"\w*. \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w did|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* \w out|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Baals|strong="H1168"\w*,

\w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w sought|strong="H1875"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H4639"\w* \w his|strong="H3478"\w* father \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* \w by|strong="H3478"\w* \w His|strong="H3478"\w* \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* \w rather|strong="H3588"\w* \w than|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w practices|strong="H4639"\w* \w of|strong="H4639"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w established|strong="H3559"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w brought|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w tribute|strong="H4503"\w*, \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* \w abundance|strong="H7230"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w riches|strong="H6239"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w honor|strong="H3519"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w took|strong="H5493"\w* delight \f + \fr 17:6 \ft Or was exalted or was courageous\f* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*; \w furthermore|strong="H5750"\w*, \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w removed|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w high|strong="H1116"\w* \w places|strong="H1116"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* Asherah poles \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

\w In|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w third|strong="H7969"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*, Jehoshaphat \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* \w officials|strong="H8269"\w* \w Ben-hail|strong="H1134"\w*, \w Obadiah|strong="H5662"\w*, \w Zechariah|strong="H2148"\w*, \w Nethanel|strong="H5417"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w Micaiah|strong="H4322"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w teach|strong="H3925"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H8141"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*,

\w accompanied|strong="H5973"\w* \w by|strong="H5973"\w* certain \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*—\w Shemaiah|strong="H8098"\w*, \w Nethaniah|strong="H5418"\w*, \w Zebadiah|strong="H2069"\w*, \w Asahel|strong="H6214"\w*, \w Shemiramoth|strong="H8070"\w*, \w Jehonathan|strong="H3083"\w*, Adonijah, \w Tobijah|strong="H2900"\w*, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w Tob-adonijah|strong="H2899"\w*—\w along|strong="H5973"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* Elishama \w and|strong="H3548"\w* \w Jehoram|strong="H3088"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w taught|strong="H3925"\w* \w throughout|strong="H3605"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, taking \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w them|strong="H3925"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Book|strong="H5612"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Law|strong="H8451"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w went|strong="H3063"\w* \w throughout|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w towns|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w taught|strong="H3925"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w dread|strong="H6343"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w fell|strong="H1961"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* lands \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w surrounded|strong="H5439"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w did|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w make|strong="H3898"\w* \w war|strong="H3898"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w*.

\w Some|strong="H4480"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w brought|strong="H6430"\w* \w gifts|strong="H4503"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w as|strong="H1571"\w* \w tribute|strong="H4503"\w* \w to|strong="H4480"\w* \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w Arabs|strong="H6163"\w* \w brought|strong="H6430"\w* \w him|strong="H4480"\w* 7,700 rams \w and|strong="H3967"\w* 7,700 \w goats|strong="H8495"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w their|strong="H1571"\w* \w flocks|strong="H6629"\w*.

\w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* \w grew|strong="H1980"\w* stronger \w and|strong="H1980"\w* stronger, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w fortresses|strong="H1003"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w store|strong="H4543"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*

\w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w kept|strong="H1961"\w* \w vast|strong="H7227"\w* \w supplies|strong="H4399"\w* \w in|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*. \w He|strong="H3389"\w* \w also|strong="H3389"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w warriors|strong="H1368"\w* \w in|strong="H5892"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w who|strong="H3063"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* \w men|strong="H1368"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w valor|strong="H2428"\w*.

\w These|strong="H1004"\w* \w are|strong="H1368"\w* \w their|strong="H5973"\w* \w numbers|strong="H6486"\w* according \w to|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w their|strong="H5973"\w* fathers: From Judah, the commanders of thousands: Adnah the commander, and with him 300,000 mighty men of valor;
next to him, Jehohanan the commander, and with him 280,000;
and next to him, Amasiah son of Zichri, the volunteer for the LORD, and with him 200,000 mighty men of valor.
From Benjamin: Eliada, a mighty man of valor, and with him 200,000 armed with bows and shields;
and next to him, Jehozabad, and with him 180,000 armed for battle.

\w These|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w served|strong="H8334"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, besides \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* stationed \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w fortified|strong="H4013"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w throughout|strong="H3605"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.
